headline: Is It Time To Reconsider AIG (AIG) After Its Strong Five Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether American International Group (AIG) is fairly priced or offering value right now, this article walks through what the current share price might be telling you. AIG recently closed at US$80.15, with returns of 0.5% over 7 days, 8.6% over 30 days, a 4.9% decline year to date, 4.7% over 1 year, 40.6% over 3 years and 91.1% over 5 years. Recent news around AIG has mainly focused on its position as a major global insurer and ongoing efforts to streamline its...
